price: Ahubwo se (Allah) yakwigenera abakobwa mu biremwa bye,[1] maze mwe akabaha umwihariko w’abahungu?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ
footnotes: [1] Muri uyu murongo Allah aranenga imyumvire idahwitse yari ifitwe n’ababangikanyamana b’i Maka batishimiraga kubyara abakobwa nyamara bakabitirira Allah.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
